Summary: More or less 30 spherical UFOs in formation.
divs: sighting detailssmall town in germany named kierspe.i saw a formation of more o less 30 spherical ufos in formation in direction south-east.were sleeping in the balcon because so hot night.they appears behind a cloud.it was the time before a electric storm.this objects desepears in a moment.ok my first idear was it was a kind of laser show -but iam not sure.it was the night after germany wons uruguay. greetings (*wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms)
